ygData.subject: This is great!
ygData.msgSnippet: I m happy to see my friends and acquaintances joining this group!  I d name names but I d undoubtedly miss someone and I d hate to offend.  This poor monk is
ygData.messageBody:
I'm happy to see my friends and acquaintances joining this group! I'd name
names but I'd undoubtedly miss someone and I'd hate to offend. This poor monk
is still a bit addled after some rather heinous deaths recently. Its
especially nice to have a storyteller in our midst, as it gives me something
to do while I heal... and heal... and heal.

Xeones - you greedy fiend. One of these days you'll abandon your lust for
expensive bits of metal and learn the true art of combat. That said, remind
me to examine our heads next time we romp around the Dervish camp. Owie.

Phoeble, Monk of Freeport, Expert on the Afterlife
